title: Fonst/Logotypes who are inspired by non-latin Typefaces
content:
Hello,   
   
for our 4th spatium issue we are searching for some Fonts or Logotypes who are inspired by the forms of non-latin Typefaces (Hebrew, kyrillic, chineses ...)   
   
We offer to different designers the possibility to present their work with such topics in the mag, that will be printed in June.   
   
If you are interested, please contact us   
   
Peter   
 [peter@spatium-magazine.de](mailto:peter@spatium-magazine.de)   
 [www.spatium-magazin.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121458/http:/www.spatium-magazin.de/) (at the moment only in german, sorry)
author: spatium : Tue, 2004-03-09 08:46

comments.content:
